tool_description: Calculates optimal pricing based on cost data, market conditions, competitor analysis, and business rules with support for various pricing strategies.

product_cost.description: Base cost of the product including materials and labor

competitor_prices.description: Array of competitor prices for comparison

pricing_strategy.description: Pricing approach: cost_plus, competitive, penetration, or premium

market_demand.description: Market demand level: low, medium, high, or very_high

discount_eligible.description: Whether product is eligible for promotional discounts

minimum_margin.description: Minimum profit margin percentage to maintain (5-50)

volume_tier.description: Expected sales volume: low, medium, high, or bulk

currency_code.description: Three-letter currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP)

error_messages: Invalid cost data: product_cost must be a positive number
Markup out of range: markup_percentage must be between 10 and 500
Invalid pricing strategy: Use one of [cost_plus, competitive, penetration, premium]
Invalid market demand: Use one of [low, medium, high, very_high]
Minimum margin violation: Calculated price would result in margin below minimum_margin
Invalid seasonal factor: seasonal_factor must be between 0.5 and 2.0
Invalid volume tier: Use one of [low, medium, high, bulk]
Unsupported currency: Provide a valid three-letter currency code
usage: Provide product_cost and markup_percentage as minimum requirements; include competitor_prices and adjust pricing_strategy, market_demand, and other parameters for sophisticated pricing calculations.

competitor_comparison.description: Position relative to competitors: below, competitive, or above

price_range.description: Suggested minimum and maximum price range
